channel.title: CVE Feed for skylot -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for skylot -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-39259|2024-08-03T12:00:43.352Z -- skylot -- jadx
item.description: jadx is a set of command line and GUI tools for producing Java source code from Android Dex and Apk files. versions prior to 1.4.5 are subject to a Denial of Service when opening zip files with HTML sequences. This issue has been patched in version 1.4.5. There are no known workarounds.

item.title: CVE-2024-32653|2024-06-06T17:32:11.148Z -- skylot -- jadx
item.description: jadx is a Dex to Java decompiler. Prior to version 1.5.0, the package name is not filtered before concatenation. This can be exploited to inject arbitrary code into the package name. The vulnerability allows an attacker to execute commands with shell privileges. Version 1.5.0 contains a patch for the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-32653|2024-08-02T02:13:40.330Z -- skylot -- jadx
item.description: jadx is a Dex to Java decompiler. Prior to version 1.5.0, the package name is not filtered before concatenation. This can be exploited to inject arbitrary code into the package name. The vulnerability allows an attacker to execute commands with shell privileges. Version 1.5.0 contains a patch for the vulnerability.
